snippet.title: Idol Showdown: Reveal Trailer | Hololive Fighting Game
snippet.description:
"When will there be a full Hololive fighting game?"
We fellow fans thought that as well. After developing this game for more than 2 years, we are very proud to reveal our first trailer.

Join the #IdolShowdown for FREE, coming Spring 2023.

(Gameplay Not Final)
Developed by Besto Game Team
(https://twitter.com/i/lists/1520588242181136391)
Twitter: https://twitter.com/IdolShowdown
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1742020/Idol_Showdown/
Website: Coming Soon

"This non-commercial game is a derivative work of Cover Corporation's Hololive property. This game is not endorsed by or directly affiliated with Cover Corporation or Hololive. The game is produced according to Cover Corporation's Derivative Work License Agreement. The developer does not claim any ownership of the Hololive property."
